title: About NVIDIA
desc: NVIDIA pioneered accelerated computing to tackle challenges no one else can solve. Our work in AI and digital twins is transforming the world's largest industries and profoundly impacting society.

carousel.title: Don’t Miss This Transformative Moment in AI
carousel.desc:
Watch Jensen Huang live on-stage as he shares AI advances that are shaping our future.
March 18, 2024 | SAP Center in San Jose, CA.

carousel.title: Pioneering Graphics for the AI Generation
carousel.desc: Watch NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang give an exclusive look at some of our newest breakthroughs, including award-winning research, OpenUSD developments, and the latest AI-powered solutions for content creation.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Takes Machine Learning to the Next Level
carousel.desc: NVIDIA Chief Scientist Billy Dally’s Hot Chips keynote covers the dramatic gains in hardware performance that spawned generative AI and ideas for future speedups that will drive machine learning to new heights.

carousel.title: NVIDIA Ranks #2 in the Best Place to Work
carousel.desc: Thanks to our employees, NVIDIA is once again one of the top places to work in the U.S., according to Glassdoor. Discover why it’s like no place you’ve ever worked.

carousel.title: Generative AI Opens New Era of Efficiency Across Industries
carousel.desc: Discover how generative AI is impacting every industry—from renewable-energy forecasting to drug discovery and more.

carousel.title: Learn the NVIDIA Story
carousel.desc: Our work is truly unique. Part science. Part art. Every breakthrough helps shape what's next.

carousel.title: Meet NVIDIA—The Engine of AI
carousel.desc: From gaming to data science and climate change, our work is transforming everyday life.

carousel.title: CNBC Charts NVIDIA’s Evolution From Gaming to Generative AI
carousel.desc: Discover how we evolved from making gaming cards to powering the generative AI revolution.

carousel.title: Breaking Barriers: Katja Codes Her Way to Success
carousel.desc: Discover Katja Sirazitdinova’s inspiring journey to become a senior deep learning data scientist at NVIDIA and learn how she’s empowering women to pursue careers in tech.
